changelog.description: Stay updated with our latest features, improvements, bug fixes, and security updates

items: Added story showcase page to display AI-generated story examples
Implemented full internationalization support (Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean, German)
Added changelog page to keep users informed of updates
Fixed language switching issue where some pages remained in English
Fixed UI text internationalization on story detail pages
Improved page loading performance with static generation
Enhanced mobile responsive layout experience
Launched core AI story generation feature
Support for multiple story formats: short, medium, long
Support for various genres: fantasy, sci-fi, romance, mystery, adventure, etc.
Multiple narrative perspective options: first-person, third-person, etc.
Customizable target audience and emotional tone
Enhanced AI generation quality for more coherent story plots
Improved user interface for a more intuitive story generation process
Official website launch
Completed basic page framework setup
Integrated Next.js 15 and latest technology stack
Implemented user authentication system (Google OAuth support)
Deployed to production environment
Implemented security verification mechanisms
Added HTTPS support
Configured CSP security policy
